projects.title: Story Mosaic
projects.description: A collaborative storytelling platform that allows writers to create and share interactive Choose Your Own Adventure games.
projects.longDescription: A collaborative storytelling platform that allows writers to create and share interactive Choose Your Own Adventure games. It features real-time collaboration, a GUI flowchart story editor, and a user-friendly interface for both writers and readers.
features: Interactive story playing experience for readers

projects.title: ARvatar
projects.description: An augmented reality messaging app with 3D avatar customization.
projects.longDescription: An augmented reality messaging app that allows users to create and customize 3D avatars, send real-time messages, and interact with their avatars in real-world environments using AR technology.
features: Join AR chat rooms with custom avatars

projects.title: MiniRenderer
projects.description: 3D software(CPU) graphics rendering engine written in C++
projects.longDescription: 3D software(CPU) graphics rendering engine written in C++. Implemented the entire rendering pipeline, including 3D transformation, triangle rasterization, shading, texture mapping, normal mapping, shadow testing, and other advanced graphics techniques.
features: Normal mapping, texturing and ambient occlusion

projects.title: 3D Narrative Game Project
projects.description: A 3D narrative-driven game developed in Unity, created for learning purposes.
projects.longDescription: A 3D narrative-driven game developed in Unity, created for learning purposes. Features stylized pixel art rendering, custom dialogue system, and branching storylines
features: Custom dialogue system with branching storylines
Stylized pixel art rendering using Unity's URP

projects.title: SVG Morph
projects.description: A simple web-based tool to create smooth morphing animations between SVGs.
projects.longDescription: A simple web-based tool to create smooth morphing animations between SVGs. Supports uploading, rendering and exporting animations with different animation easing options.
features: Upload and chain multiple SVG files for morphing
Create smooth morphing animations with settings for duration, easing, and framerate
Export animations as MP4 in various resolutions including 4K

projects.title: Definitely Not a Rip-off
projects.description: Experimental narrative puzzle game based off game industry memes.
projects.longDescription: An experimental comedic narrative puzzle game based off game industry memes. Role in the team: Programmer, Designer and Writer
features: Fourth-wall breaking gameplay and humorous dialogues
Completed in 7 days (2-people team) for NUS Game Craft 2025

projects.title: RPG Framework in Godot
projects.description: A RPG framework built in Godot Engine to facilitate the development of 2D RPG games.
projects.longDescription: A RPG framework built in Godot Engine to facilitate the development of 2D RPG games. Contains a map system, quest system, inventory management, SRPG battle system, weather system and more.
features: Other common RPG systems such as quests and inventory

projects.title: Isekai Goddess Simulator
projects.description: A worker placement strategy game that captures the essence of real-time strategy games.
projects.longDescription: A worker placement strategy game that captures the essence of real-time strategy games. You play as a goddess that helps lost souls to respawn in Isekai as adventurers, with the end goal of defeating the demon lord.
features: Unique worker placement mechanics adapted for real-time gameplay
Completed in 7 days (solo) for NUS Game Craft 2023

projects.title: My OpenGL Rendering Engine
projects.description: My custom GPU graphics rendering engine built with OpenGL. Used for learning purposes.
projects.longDescription: My custom GPU graphics rendering engine built with OpenGL. Used for learning purposes. Implemented various graphics techniques including Phong shading, cube mapping, skyboxes, normal vector visualization. Will work on it when I feel like it.
